title: ranked in a nutshell
body:
xXxxXxXxXxXToxicZedMainXXXXxxxx: give mid and i carry :)

xxxxxXxXtoxicyasmainXXxxx: no

xXxxXxXxXxXToxicZedMainXXXXxxxx: ill int if you dont

xxxxxXxXtoxicyasmainXXxxx: yes

xXxxXxXxXxXToxicZedMainXXXXxxxx ended up going 0/10, while blaming his team for everything. he is still not banned to this day.

replies.body:
I'm like "please give me Maokai on ARAM, I get S grades and multiple honours all the time with him.
I'll tank more than anyone else and still have top damage."
Response is no, followed by a feed on a full AP Mao who deals no damage, fml.
